mentions.tacticalSituation: Tactical website from Best for Britain, www.getvoting.org, shows that nearly 200 seats across the UK could be decided by Labour supporters voting tactically for the Liberal Democrats. Whether the Conservative or the Liberal Democrat wins will come down to how many Labour supporters lend their vote to the Liberal Democrats. The Liberal Democrats have the best chance to win seats from the Conservatives, keeping them from a majority. But only if enough Labour supporters back the Liberal Democrats this time.

contactInformation.address: 4 Bravingtons Walk, King's Cross, London, N1 9GA

quotes.text: You know from previous elections that a vote for anyone other than the Liberal Democrats can end up with a Conservative MP.

images.caption: Mike Smithson, Polling and Elections Expert

leaflet.additionalNotes: I'm not here to tell you who to vote for, but I hope this information is useful to you when making a decision in this election.
